refbody.section: PurposeDisplay details of physical disks that are controlled by the RAID card controller.

ul.li: Detailed information displayed will be different based on different RAID card controllers.
The Location or Position information shows the physical location of the disks on the appliance. On the hard drive tray or front panel of the appliance, text mapping is with this location information.
